title: NFL Draft With Todd McShay & Steven Cheah, Ja Morant Is A Killer And Introducing KennysHands.com
description:
The Timberwolves stay cursed as Ja Morant sucks their soul out of their chest. (00:02:41-00:10:19) The Heat finish off a terrible Trae Young performance and the Hawks. (00:10:25-00:20:44) We recap Monday night and the completion of the Whomp Bet live from Brooklyn. (00:22:11-00:39:54) Hot Seat/Cool Throne including a Brand New Website KennysHands.com in defense of our guy Kenny Pickett. (00:39:55-00:57:20) Todd McShay joins the show to break down the draft, give us an answer on where current Tom Brady would be drafted, and tons more draft talk. (00:58:43-01:35:47) And we finish the show with Guys on Picks with Steven Cheah.Â (01:37:22-02:09:07)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
